MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.34am to carry out repairs to an underground cable fault at Eddleview substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.51am on Monday 29th March 2021.
